article_title: Sanford meets with immigration reform supporters in town hall meeting
article_text: Immigration reform supporters finally got their long-awaited town hall meeting with U.S. Rep. Mark Sanford. More than 200 people packed the Holy Family Catholic Church on Sunday afternoon on Hilton Head Island to question Sanford about his stance on the issue.

article_summary:
Immigration reform supporters finally got their long-awaited town hall meeting with U.S. Rep. Mark Sanford.
More than 200 people packed the Holy Family Catholic Church on Sunday afternoon on Hilton Head Island to question Sanford about his stance on the issue.
